problem.markdown:
1. In a cooking pan which of the following is important while selecting a material for the pan's handle? ( ) High hardness ( ) High elasticity ( ) High thermal expansion (x) Low thermal conductivity
2. In Electrical Discharge Machining (EDM), the heat is supplied ( ) External heating from the source ( ) Due to explosion of the dielectric fluid ( ) Internally due to absorption of spark energy in the surface of materials (x) Energy distribution from the plasma column created within the spark gap
3. In wire EDM ,the tool is ( ) Hollow conductive tool (x) Conductive wire electrode ( ) Conductive solid moving tool ( ) Solid insulating tool
4. In EDM, generally the working fluid is ( ) Electrolyte ( ) De-ionized water ( ) EDM oil (x) Kerosene
5. In wire EDM, generally the working fluid is ( ) Water + Kerosene ( ) Kerosene (x) De-ionized water ( ) Electrolyte
problem.p: 1. In a cooking pan which of the following is important while selecting a material for the pan's handle?
2. In Electrical Discharge Machining (EDM), the heat is supplied

choicegroup.choice: Due to explosion of the dielectric fluid
Internally due to absorption of spark energy in the surface of materials
Energy distribution from the plasma column created within the spark gap

problem.p: 4. In EDM, generally the working fluid is
5. In wire EDM, generally the working fluid is
